TextView.android:text: The annual cultural festival of Delhi Technological University, Engifest is a four day cultural extravaganza held in the month of February. Engifest comes as a breath of fresh air, bridging the gap between technical education and creativity. It is a much-needed wave, rich in cultural diversity, which rejuvenates, refreshes and titillates the soul and gives creativity a chance to flourish. Engifest is a symbol of achievement and pride. It is a product of dreams, ambition and tireless hardwork, a true testimony to the indomitable spirit, liveliness and sheer energy of youth.
